thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 30 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Russia's Gazprom says aware of Ukrainian move to enforce arbitration

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Gazprom says aware of Ukrainian move to enforce arbitration
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian gas giant Gazprom said on Wednesday it was aware of actions by Ukrainian oil and gas firm Naftogaz to enforce an arbitration court ruling.
FILE PHOTO: The logo of Russian gas giant Gazprom is seen on a board at the St. Petersburg International Economic Forum 2017 (SPIEF 2017) in St. Petersburg, Russia, June 1, 2017. Picture taken June 1, 2017. REUTERS/Sergei Karpukhin/File Photo Naftogaz said earlier on Wednesday it had initiated the enforcement of a $2.6 billion award from the Stockholm arbitration court from Gazprom.
Gazprom said it had not received official notification about the procedure.
Reporting by Vladimir Soldatkin and Oksana Kobzeva; Writing by Tom Balmforth; Editing by Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber
